pages.text: $(9)Splitting$() is a brand new anvil-exclusive enchantment.$(p)A splitting anvil is capable of "splitting" enchanted books with multiple enchantments on them into a series of individual books.

To use a splitting anvil, throw an enchanted book into the world, and place the anvil so that it lands on top of the book.$(p)A book with Sharpness III and Looting II that is split would become two books, one with Sharpness III and another with Looting II.
